data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Khordha, Odisha, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khordha, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Khordha, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, 2,251,700 people live in the county of Khordha. Please, give them 450 new simple churches this year.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Khordha, Odisha, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Nagavasulu people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Khordha, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 24,769 believers in Khordha to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Khordha access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Khordha
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Velanadu, Kasar Otari, Alia, Gandla, Khendra
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Velanadu (120,000), Kasar Otari (22,000), Alia (56,000), Gandla (74,000), Khendra (400)
